source_caption_data.pre_caption: This fast-moving video provides an aerial, point-of-view shot of a city at dusk. The scene captures a dense urban environment with numerous skyscrapers and buildings under construction, evidenced by large cranes. The warm colors of the sunset are visible in the sky as the city lights begin to illuminate the landscape below.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: Just saying "point-of-view" shot may be vague. Say it is from the point of view of a drone instead.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The term "point-of-view" shot is somewhat vague. It would be clearer to specify that the perspective is from a drone.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The term "point-of-view" shot is somewhat vague. It would be clearer to specify that the perspective is from a drone.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This fast-moving video provides an aerial shot from a drone of a city at dusk. The scene captures a dense urban environment with numerous skyscrapers and buildings under construction, evidenced by large cranes. The warm colors of the sunset are visible in the sky as the city lights begin to illuminate the landscape below.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This fast-moving video provides an aerial shot from a drone of a city at dusk. The scene captures a dense urban environment with numerous skyscrapers and buildings under construction, evidenced by large cranes. The warm colors of the sunset are visible in the sky as the city lights begin to illuminate the landscape below.

generated_critique: The term "point-of-view" shot is somewhat vague. It would be clearer to specify that the perspective is from a drone. Additionally, you could mention that several pedestrians are visible walking along the city streets, as this helps clarify the scale and activity within the urban environment.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This fast-moving video provides an aerial shot from a drone of a city at dusk. The scene captures a dense urban environment with numerous skyscrapers and buildings under construction, evidenced by large cranes. The warm colors of the sunset are visible in the sky as the city lights begin to illuminate the landscape below. Several pedestrians are visible walking along the city streets, adding to the sense of scale and activity within the urban environment.
